name: QX HEXAGON
description: A simple theme for qruiser.com that takes away the old boring 1980'ich style and replaces it with a wider more modern look.
additional_info:
Since userstyles seams to have "some problem" handling display: grid; you're forced to head over to my GitHub and download the complete style from there and import it manually.
  • QX Hexagon
On the above link you will find easy to install-buttons for both the UserStyle, as well as for the UserScript! Changes v1.0.02018-12-01
  • A complete rewrite of both userstyle and userscript, so both are now ready for the new QX (beta) site!
  • Install QX HexaGon UserStyle
  • Install QX HexaGon Companion
V3.1.5 2018-09-15
  • Further tweaking of the JS injected styles
V3.1.4 2018-09-11
  • Styling the promotion shop page (Buy goldmember status)
  • Styling the club type text a bit
  • Styling the star signs widget
  • Styling the different info text widgets in the center column
  • Styling the gaymap widget
  • Styling the latest from qx.se widget
  • Styling new and active clubs widgets
  • Styling the "banners"
  • Styling the store to conform with the rest of the sites form buttons
  • Tweaking the member search a bit
  • Tweaking the up and down icons
  • Tweaking the edit settings popup
  • Tweaking the status images a bit more
  • Tweaking the movies background size
  • Making the club utility links behave the same as the subnavbar
  • Adding an empty/default club avatar for clubs that dont have this set
  • Extending the "about info" and the matching clubs widgets
  • Extending the line header
  • Excluding the original PM from the flex style
  • Making the satellite looking the same even when not logged in
